---
title: Scholaricons Quarto Extension
format: html
---

This extension allows you to use [Scholaricons](https://treysaddler.github.io/scholaricons/) in your Quarto HTML documents. It provides an `{{{< sci >}}}` shortcode:

- Mandatory `<icon-name>`:
  ``` markdown
  {{{< sci <icon-name> >}}}
  ```

- Optional `<size=...>`:
  ``` markdown
  {{{< sci <icon-name> <size=...> >}}}
  ```

- Optional `<color=...>`:
  ``` markdown
  {{{< sci <icon-name> <color=...> >}}}
  ```

- Optional `<hsize=...>` and `<psize=...>` to specify different sizes for HTML and PDF documents:
  ``` markdown
  {{{< sci <icon-name> <hsize=...> <psize=...> >}}}
  ```

For example:

| Shortcode                          | Icon                           |
|------------------------------------|--------------------------------|
| `{{{< sci arxiv >}}}`               | {{< sci arxiv >}}               |
| `{{{< sci google-scholar >}}}`      | {{< sci google-scholar >}}      |
| `{{{< sci open-access >}}}`         | {{< sci open-access >}}         |
| `{{{< sci open-access size=5x >}}}` | {{< sci open-access size=5x >}} |
| `{{{< sci open-access size=3x >}}}` | {{< sci open-access size=3x >}} |
| `{{{< sci open-access hsize=xl psize=Large >}}}` | {{< sci open-access hsize=xl psize=Large >}} |
| `{{{< sci open-access color=red >}}}` | {{< sci open-access color=red >}} |
